name: Levi Chronicles
description:
Objective

An Explorer by the name of Leviticus Colman and his crew have been reported as missing from an expedition. You and a group of friends must go and explore the Ice Mountains to find out what happened to Levi and his crew before the blizzard become too strong.


When you start you will need to choose a “Role” to play as. Each Role will have its own unique abilities that will help you and your team on your journey. You will need to work together as there will be many trials, many puzzles, many mysteries that you will uncover. Are you able to find out what happened to Levi?


Leviticus Colman Exploration Logs


Explorers log #673
Day 74
After countless days of digging up old pottery and artefacts, I’ve stumbled across a tablet just like the one I’ve seen in other religious temples. I’ve put the clues together. I believe there is a connection.
The 4 main gods of the past all seem to have these tablets in common. Eldorat… the God of Foundation. Prizmite… the God of Civilisation. Demotite… the God of Patience, and Helit… the God of Fire.
I have been translating the tablets I have uncovered, and they seem to point to a location in the Ice capped mountains of Picchi d’incontro. I have made plans to head out on an expedition to the Mountains. I have gathered a Crew that will come along with me. I only hope we find a connection. This would change everything…
-Leviticus Colman


Explorers Log #712
Day Unknown
This may be the last words coming from me. My Crew and I are stuck in the snow heavy mountains and cannot find our way back. A massive blizzard has hit us, and we can’t leave! If you find this note SEND HELP!
-Leviticus Colman

What is it about???



Levi Chronicles is a Multiplayer, Story, Puzzle Adventure. This game is a 4 player Minimum and 6 player maximum game. This game will take you along a journey that is like no other. Full of questions.


“I hope your enjoy this game when it’s released.”
-Ryan
